name: The Last Spring
description:
A Text-based game based on the events of last year. I wrote about my personal struggles with being a queer game dev and the proceeding quarantine that happen in Spring of 2020. It's a short game on self-reflection, isolation, and over-thinking. 

This was a part of the Sunshower Slowjam for the Friendship Garden 2021 Summer Game Jam with the theme "Queerness in Quarantine"
